title: My Love Life Took An Ugly Turn
itunes:title: My Love Life Took An Ugly Turn
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have a problem and I really need advice from the guys on the show, but Ms. Shirley, you can take a stab at it too. I’ve been single for most of my life and I finally figured out why. I’m a 28 year old man, never married, no kids and I own my home. I make really good money and I have a leadership position at my job. My problem is that I’m starting to realize that I’m not the most handsome guy in the world..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
